stadium.name: The Su'akour Bowl
stadium.description: A crude, rowdy stadium built within the half-finished, black-stone walls of the warlord Su'akour's abandoned fortress. The stands are crumbling ruins, and the entire arena perpetually stinks of the nearby sulfur marshes.

stats.pregame_ritual: Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Staring at a single blade of grass until their eyes water.
Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Consulting a folk rhyme about the weather to predict the game's outcome.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Staring at a single blade of grass until their eyes water.
Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Consulting a folk rhyme about the weather to predict the game's outcome.

stadium.name: The Guilder's Field
stadium.description: An opulent stadium sponsored by the powerful Merchant's Guild. The stands feature luxurious, velvet-lined boxes for bankers, who are often more focused on making deals than the game.

stats.pregame_ritual: Washing their hands with dirt.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Meticulously cleaning each stud on their boots with a special brush.
Eating a raw onion, layer by layer, without crying.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.
Sharpening the edges of their blunted weapon (an exercise in futility).
Humming a tune they believe only they know.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.

Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE SU'AKOUR BOWL! üéôÔ∏è

**Good evening, Trollball fans, and welcome to the sulfur-choked ruins of Brimstone!** üåã It‚Äôs Nok the Corrupter here, your voice of violence, broadcasting live from the Su'akour Bowl! Take a deep breath, folks‚Äîactually, don‚Äôt! The **Noxious Fumes** are thick enough to chew on tonight, and that‚Äôs just how we like it! It smells like rotten eggs and victory down here!

Tonight, we‚Äôve got a clash of cultures that would make my boss Lord Orzalon weep tears of joy! In the visiting corner, carrying the weight of the **Guild of the Black Sky** on their velvet-lined shoulders, it‚Äôs **THE NEW PROSPERITY PROFITS**! üí∞ I hear Chairman Brennen Farno is in the stands, probably trying to figure out if he can tax the blood splatter on the field. Keep an eye on **Pulchi Benyamin**‚ÄîI just watched them eat an entire dandelion, stem and all, right off the pitch! That‚Äôs the kind of unhinged dietary fiber you need to survive in this league!

And defending this crumbling fortress, representing the goody-two-shoes over in Eponore (blegh), it‚Äôs **THE BRIMSTONE FIRE EATERS**! üî• I‚Äôm sure **Sir Tanos** is somewhere polishing his sword and hoping everyone plays nice‚ÄîSPOILER ALERT: THEY WON'T! I saw **Lowson Hersh** staring at a single blade of grass for twenty minutes during warm-ups until they started crying. That‚Äôs focus! Or madness! Either way, it spells PAIN for the opposition!

So grab your ale, ignore the crumbling walls, and get ready for a night where the only market fluctuation is the rising cost of medical bills! **LET‚ÄôS PLAY TROLLBALL!** üèàüëπ
postGame:
# ü©∏ A BLOODBATH IN THE BOWL! PROFITS CASH OUT! ü©∏

**BY THE ABYSS!** What a game, folks! What a beautiful, chaotic, bone-crunching display of violence! If you tuned in for strategy, you came to the wrong frequency because tonight was purely about **survival**! The medics earned their paychecks today, running onto the field more often than the ball carriers! üöë

Let‚Äôs look at the carnage! **Aufmann Tedric** started things off early by absolutely flattening **Selimah Tully**‚ÄîI heard that snap all the way up here in the booth! CRUNCH! But the Profits weren't just hitting; they were scoring! **Gladdie Farika** took it to the rack for a slam dunk to put New Prosperity on the board! üèÄ

The Fire Eaters fought back, literally and figuratively! **Lowson Hersh** answered with a dunk of their own to tie it up, but the violence escalated quickly. We saw **Campball Fink** and **Yoshi Cathy** trading injuries like they were collecting trading cards! Bodies were hitting the floor faster than the Guild's approval ratings! üìâ

Then came the **SHOOTOUT**! üèπ **Abramson Doxia** launched a missile from way downtown‚ÄîTWO POINTS for the Profits! **Nigel Rothmuller** fired back for Brimstone, and **Milman Galvan** answered right back! The scoreboard was lighting up almost as much as the players' pain receptors!

Despite a late, valiant dunk by **Lowson Hersh** to bring the Fire Eaters within one, the clock‚Äîand the casualty list‚Äîwas against them. The final whistle blows with the scoreboard reading **Profits: 5, Fire Eaters: 4**! üèÜ

I bet **Nikos Thanae** is down there right now, trying to figure out how to foreclose on the stadium ruins. And as for the Fire Eaters? Well, at least they have **Sir Artorias** to give them a motivational speech about "trying your best." Hah! In Trollball, your best isn't enough unless it leaves the other guy unconscious!

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! Remember, keep your head on a swivel, and if you see a hero, trip them! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüëπ
